attributes.action: Make it law that the 2nd and 3rd lanes on the motorways are used for overtaking purposes only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Get rid of those second lane drivers, make it law that the second and third lane should only be used to overtake a slower moving vehicle.

Traffic would move much quicker if the British followed the same example as the Dutch or Germans, and they only have two lanes in places!

Make it law that once you have overtaken the slower vehicle you move back into your original lane.

Its quite an easy process and it works!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
